bug.author: smivv
bug.summary: Bug with default input and output keys
bug.description: As far as I understood, criterion module is wrapping now with CriterionCallback. But the problem is that in CriterionCallback there is a default output_key='logits', and if I have no 'logits' in my outputs of neural net, I receive an error KeyError: 'logits'. To reproduce it you just need to set output_key to something that does not contain 'logits'. Also the same thing we have for 'features' key for inputs. Link to discussion on slack: <denchmark-link:https://opendatascience.slack.com/archives/CGK4KQBHD/p1578479340006900>https://opendatascience.slack.com/archives/CGK4KQBHD/p1578479340006900</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hmm, somehow input_target_key arguments fixed this problem ðŸ¤”
